subject: Re: Order #SSN3144 confirmed
description_text:
Hi,

The control box I ordered doesn’t fit the cables from my pedals.  I’m
guessing I needed to order plus X control box.  Can I exchange the control
box I ordered for the right one? Or is there any other way for me to make
my existing control box work?

Is there a way to just plug the linear motors into the control box I
purchased and keep my pedals plugged into the control box that came with
the pedals and still have everything work?

Thanks,
Muthu

conversations.body_text: Hi Muthu Ramanathan,   The correct control box to use is the PlusX Control Box. However, if you want to use both control boxes at the same time, please note the following:  SimHub may not be able to recognize both devices simultaneously. You can try this setup:    Open SimHub.    Plug in the ProX Ultra Control Box first and make sure it works properly.    Then plug in the PlusX Pedal Control Box.    Do not run SimHub and SIMSONN Manager at the same time to avoid conflicts.    With this setup, ProX Ultra will handle telemetry vibration, while Pro Plus will handle the pedal signals.

Thank you for the quick response.  Are you able to help me do an exchange
with the control boxes?  I just don't want to have to fight any issues and
would like everything to work flawlessly. I can return my current box if
you could ship me the correct box.

Thanks,
Muthu

On Sun, Nov 9, 2025 at 5:26 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Muthu Ramanathan,  Alternatively, you can simply cover the basic shipping cost, and we’ll send you a PlusX control box for free. The return shipping cost would be higher than the value of the control box itself, so it’s more practical. You can also sell your existing control box as a used item if you prefer.
